item.description:
Our next hike is going to be in the Eastern Block of Nehantic State Forest.  

 

About 3 miles, a lot of hills, mud and the dogs love it.


State Web Site:
http://www.ct.gov/dep/cwp/view.asp?A=2716&Q=325064

Trail Map:
http://www.ct.gov/dep/lib/dep/stateparks/maps/nehanticrt11.pdf

Directions off website:
The parking lot is at the west end of Holmes Rd in East Lyme. You can put this address in your GPS:

99 Holmes Rd, East Lyme, CT 06333

 

Follow the road to the end.

Otherwise from route 85, turn onto (go west on) Salem Turnpike (actually a well-hidden and very small street), then bear left onto Holmes Rd, the parking area is all the way at the end.

http://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&q=41.438,-72.264

 

Lost?  Call or SMS Fred.  860-227-4027.
item.how_to_find_us: Fred will be there in his blue go-kart. Beep-Beep!!
item.name: Eastern Block of Nehantic State Forest
